title: Silverlink To Lead Discussion On Population Segmentation in Healthcare at AHIP’s Consumer Experience & Digital Health Forum
text:
Silverlink Communications, Inc. 
BURLINGTON, Mass. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Silverlink Communications, Inc ., the leader in consumer health engagement technology, today announced that it will host a session entitled, “Segmentation: Because One Size Never Fits All” at this week’s Consumer Experience & Digital Forum on Tuesday, October 13, 2015 at 3:00 PM. The conference takes place October 12-14 at the Swissotel Chicago. 
"Segmentation is a long proven technique to increase the success of consumer communications. In healthcare it’s even more imperative as we have very diverse populations to communicate to,” said Kathleen Ellmore, VP of Engagement Sciences, Silverlink Communications. “Segmentation is key in driving relevance so health plans can better engage their members and increase positive behavior change." 
During the session, panelists will discuss how evidence-based segmentation can help health plans more effectively: communicate with members through highly relevant messages; predict member behaviors drive consumer action deliver a positive member experience that builds brand and loyalty. 
Attendees will also hear how one leading health plan is using advanced segmentation technology to deliver a consumer experience that has dramatically improved results in programs ranging from chronic care management to loyalty. 
“Motivating consumers to take a desired action requires highly relevant and personalized outreach that meets consumers where they are in their healthcare journey, said David Veroff, SVP, Analytics, Silverlink Communications. “To move the needle for a specific population, health plans need to go beyond a one size fits all approach and embrace a targeted and customized member outreach strategy that is specific to, and resonates with, each individual member. Segmentation is the key.” 
AHIP's Consumer and Digital Health Forum will go beyond the tech tools and gadgets to provide insights on practical, tactical ways of engaging consumers in their health and the health care system. How is data captured, shared and used to create actionable insights and how are disruptors changing the health care landscape as we know it; and how can digital engagement tools help consumers reach their potential. 
Following the presentation, and during exhibit hall hours, panelists will be available in the Silverlink Booth (#59) to continue the discussion with interested attendees. 
About Silverlink Silverlink is the proven leader in engagement management technology for healthcare organizations. Our technology enables health plans and other key stakeholders to engage and support their members in smarter and more effective ways. We deliver better control, coordination and effectiveness in member communications to promote healthy and loyal behaviors.
